channel.title: InYourBones — Bay Area Radar (far_out)
channel.description: Curated upcoming Bay Area shows from InYourBones.

item.title: Florence + The Machine @ Chase Center
item.description: 2026-05-16 02:30 — Florence + The Machine at Chase Center. Florence + The Machine is known for their powerful live performances and emotional depth, making this a must-see event.

item.title: Demi Lovato @ Chase Center
item.description: 2026-05-12 03:00 — Demi Lovato at Chase Center. Demi Lovato's upcoming tour promises a strong narrative and personal connection, appealing to a wide audience.

item.title: Meghan Trainor @ Chase Center
item.description: 2026-08-09 01:30 — Meghan Trainor at Chase Center. Meghan Trainor's tour is generating buzz with her upbeat pop sound and engaging stage presence.

item.title: Ariana Grande @ Oakland Arena
item.description: 2026-06-07 03:00 → 2026-06-11 03:00 — Ariana Grande at Oakland Arena. Ariana Grande's tour is highly anticipated, showcasing her impressive vocal range and fan-favorite hits.

item.title: RUSH @ SAP Center at San Jose
item.description: 2026-10-18 02:30 — RUSH at SAP Center at San Jose. RUSH's legacy continues to attract fans, making their upcoming shows a nostalgic experience for many.

item.title: Jack Johnson @ Greek Theatre-U.C. Berkeley
item.description: 2026-10-01 01:30 → 2026-10-02 01:30 — Jack Johnson at Greek Theatre-U.C. Berkeley. Jack Johnson's laid-back style and connection to nature resonate well with audiences, especially in outdoor venues.

item.description: 2026-07-15 02:00 — Forrest Frank at Oakland Arena. Forrest Frank's tour is gaining traction, appealing to fans of fresh and innovative pop music.

item.description: 2026-11-19 03:00 — Three Days Grace at SAP Center at San Jose. Three Days Grace's hard rock sound continues to resonate, promising an electrifying live show.

item.description: 2026-07-18 02:30 — Bob Moses at Greek Theatre-U.C. Berkeley. Bob Moses is known for their captivating live shows, blending electronic and live instrumentation seamlessly.

item.description: 2026-07-19 03:00 — Rainbow Kitten Surprise at Greek Theatre-U.C. Berkeley. Rainbow Kitten Surprise's unique sound and storytelling make their concert a compelling experience.

item.title: Joyce Manor @ The Fillmore
item.description: 2026-05-16 02:00 — Joyce Manor at The Fillmore. Joyce Manor's energetic performances and engaging punk sound are sure to attract a dedicated crowd.

item.title: Train @ Shoreline Amphitheatre
item.description: 2026-08-27 01:45 — Train at Shoreline Amphitheatre. TRAIN's anniversary tour celebrates their classic hits, appealing to long-time fans and newcomers alike.

item.description: 2026-08-16 01:45 — Toto at Shoreline Amphitheatre. Yellowcard's nostalgia-driven tour is perfect for fans looking to relive their favorite hits.

item.description: 2026-10-08 02:30 — The Neighbourhood at Bill Graham Civic Auditorium. The Neighbourhood's atmospheric sound and engaging performances make their show a highlight for indie fans.

item.description: 2026-05-12 03:00 — The New Pornographers at The Castro Theatre. The New Pornographers are known for their catchy melodies and strong live presence, appealing to indie rock fans.
